What is the outlook for Kleine-Levin Syndrome ?,Episodes eventually decrease in frequency and intensity over the course of eight to 12 years.,NINDS,Kleine-Levin Syndrome
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Kleine-Levin Syndrome ?,NINDS supports a broad range
